title: CRXDE Lite/CRX is on ██████ exposed that leads to PII disclosure
content:
hi team ,
i found that aem is running on████████ and CRXDE Lite/CRX is exposed to unauthenticated user that can lead to information disclosure
POC
1-visit https://██████//██████████
2-go to query and search for admin then execute
3-go to this endpoint to retrieve the information
Code 30 Bytes
1https://████████//████████/███

Code 646 Bytes

2Host: ████
3Connection: close

8Accept: text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,image/avif,image/webp,image/apng,*/*;q=0.8,application/signed-exchange;v=b3;q=0.9

Impact
PII exposure
System Host(s)
██████
Affected Product(s) and Version(s)
CVE Numbers
Steps to Reproduce
1-visit https://████████//█████████
2-go to query and search for admin then execute
3-go to this endpoint to retrieve the information
Code 27 Bytes
1https://█████//███████/████
Suggested Mitigation/Remediation Actions
steps: Visit the exposed CRXDE Lite/CRX endpoint at the given URL
Use the query feature to search for 'admin' and execute the query
Access the specified endpoint to retrieve sensitive PII data
vuln_description: The vulnerability involves an exposed CRXDE Lite/CRX interface that allows unauthenticated users to query and retrieve sensitive Personally Identifiable Information (PII) from the system.
reason: The attack is straightforward, involving direct access to an exposed administrative interface and executing a simple query. There are no complex interactions or state manipulations required.
